root.name: Storm: Frontline Nation
root.description: OverviewStorm: Frontline Nation is a turn-based strategy game developed by Colossai Studios AB and published by Just A Game Gmbh. Set in the near future, Frontline Nation has players fighting for control of over 45 nations across Europe and North Africa. The games features two kinds of turn-based gameplay: direct control over military units via its hexagonal grid based battles and large scale control over your chosen nation through resources management, diplomacy and research.
